彏字的基本解释

彏
jué
弓弦急张：“彏天狼之威弧。”

彏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》居縛切，入藥，見。］
［《廣韻》許縛切，入藥，曉。］
急张弓。

彏字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　彏； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页362第02
【唐韻】許縛切【集韻】【韻會】怳縛切，?音䂄。【說文】弓急張也。【集韻】急弦謂之彏。【尸子】鴻鵠在上，扞弓彏弩待之。【揚雄·河東賦】彏天狼之威弧。　又【廣韻】居縛切【集韻】厥縛切，?音攫。義同。

彏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
彏字的起名意思

暂无。

jué
The bowstring slammed: "The arc of Sirius' majesty."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guang Yun" is bound to cut, used as medicine, see. ]
["Guang Yun" Xu Fu cut, used as medicine, Xiao. ]
Open your bow in a hurry.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Jixia] [Bow Character Department] 　彏; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 362 02
[Tang Yun] Xu Fuqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Tie Fuqie,? Yin Qi. [Said the text] The bow is also anxious. [Ji Yun] Ji Xian is called Ji. [Scorpion] Honghu is on top, defend the bow and wait for it. 【Yang Xiong·Hedong Fu】The prestige arc of Sirius.　 [Guang Yun] Jue Bing cut [Ji Yun] Jue Bing cut,? Sound snap. The same meaning.
